message: I have a product that I think you'll really like. It's one of the best products I have, and I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it. I'm asking $100 for it, but I'm willing to offer you a special deal. If you buy it, I'll give you a 50/50 chance to get it for $50 if you're not satisfied with it after you've had a chance to use it for a day. Would you like to buy it for $100, or take a chance at the potential $50 deal?
I'll take the current product for $100.

I want to follow up on the previous product you purchased. I've had a chance to review our interaction, and I think you're someone who values quality. However, I also want to be transparent with you. I've got another product that's not quite up to my usual standards. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to give you a heads up that it might not meet your expectations. Would you like to take a chance and buy it, or would you rather pass?
I'm not interested in buying a product that you think might not meet my expectations. I'd rather pass.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I appreciate your honesty. I've got another product that I think you'll really like. This one is one of my best, and I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 100% guarantee: if you buy this product and aren't completely happy with it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. Would you like to take advantage of this deal and buy it for $100?
I'll take the current product, but I'll be keeping a close eye on it. I'm skeptical of the 100% guarantee, but I'm willing to give you the benefit of the doubt this time.

I completely understand your skepticism, and I appreciate your willingness to give me another chance. I want to be upfront with you again - this next product is not one of my best. I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not willing to pay $80 for a product that you consider to be one of your lesser items. I'll pass on this one.

I'm interested in the deal, but I'm not sure if the accessory is worth $20. I'll take the product, but I'll be keeping an eye on the accessory's value.

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! I want to assure you that the accessory is indeed worth $20, and it's something that many of my customers have loved. However, I also want to give you another option. Since you've been a great customer so far, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. I'm tempted by the offer, but I'm not sure if the accessories are worth $60. I'll take the product, but I'll be keeping a close eye on the total value of the deal.
